name: Skully's Dungeon
description:
You play Skully! 

This little skeleton is about to overcome this dungeon. It is populated by one eye monsters, and I think there might be a big one!

I wonder what their weakness is....

What to expect?
  • 4 levels
  • 1 Boss
  • Keys and door to your liking!
  • Nasty spikes
  • Evil one eye monsters
  • A satisfying slap :D

----------

This game was made in 30 days for the "Game Off 2022" game jam. 

The theme was "Cliché", so the concept is based on big obvious weak points on enemies.  :)
